document_data.name: Elfmeet
document_data.mainbody: '''Elfmeet''' was a small community in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.Geography: The hamlet was located right on the edge of the [[Long Canyon]]. It had a spring at its center, and there were trails leading to the bottom of the canyon.
document_data.Inhabitants: Elfmeet was an [[Azuposi]] settlement with a static population of 400, but was a favored place for the nomadic [[Poscadar elf|Poscadari]] to go to trade with the Azuposi.
